alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:29PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cherry County through 315 PM CDT... At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Merritt Reservoir, or 12 miles southwest of Valentine, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Alkali Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Highway 97 crossing the Niobrara River and Schlagel Creek State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 201 and 218. Highway 97 between mile markers 123 and 138. Highway 83 between mile markers 193 and 207. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
